title: When IS reworked RYZE COMING TO OCE
body: I want to soon make reworked ryze as one of my mains since the old ryze is so boring and lacking characteristic. When is the reworked ryze around, gonna come to oce

replies.body:
Same time as every other time a champion is reworked, with the next patch.
All servers get reworks at the same time.

Not too bright are you.
next week on wednesday or thursday
